channel.title: Frost Blades - Simply the best
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://frostblades.org/ad/logo.png[/img] [img]http://frostblades.org/ad/divider.png[/img] [COLOR=teal]Looking to play a dedicated server that updates often with many many features running 24/7 stands out of the crowd with a billion features? look no further! We bring you Frost blades, a dedicated server which runs 24/7 with no lag, we are a Matrix based server, we have many many features, a good economy, we update daily and never fail to impress.
If there's something we don't have and you'd like to see, just let us know.
Features: Frost blades server: - We are currently 718 Loading 737! We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a 'perfect' pvp system, Loyalty programme, and much more![/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]PvP/Pking:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- We have a refined Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Good Switching - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]PvM:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - All other God-wars bosses! - Duel arena - Castle Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]PvP And PvM:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Grand Exchange[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- MySql Database - Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape - Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape - Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Highscores[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape - Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape - Can compare your skills with other players skills - Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating [/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Skills:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Attack - Strength - Defence - Ranged - Magic - RuneCrafting - Construction - Player Owned Houses - Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop! - Constitution - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - FireMaking - WoodCutting - Farming - Summoning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Monsters:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- TzTok-Jad - Haar'Aken - WildyWyem - Ice Strykewyrm - Glacors - Kalphite Queen - Kree'Arra - Nex - General Graardor - Commander Zilyana - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Frost Dragons - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Deamons - Queen Black Dragon[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Minigames:[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00] - Barrows - Castle Wars - Combat Titans (Custom minigame) - Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Bounty Hunter (2009 Version) - Fight Pits - The Crusible - Warriors guild - Soul Wars - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Pest Control - Fist of Guthix - Clan Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Others:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Grave Stones - Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server. - More Auras - Decanting - Fixed Shops - Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses. - Bones-on-Altar - Effigies - Full Quick Chat - All Spells in the ancients Spell book - Trading - Dicing - Curses & Prayers - Perfect combat, 100% flawless - Armour set effects all added - Flawless Music & Sound system - Full Completionists cape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Quests:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Lost City - Doric's Quest - Imp Catcher - Demon Slayer - Doric's Quest - Ernest the chicken - Goblin Diplomacy - Imp Catcher - Rune Mysteries - Cooks Assistant - Nomad's Requiem[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#0000FF]Other:[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00FF00]- Cache error fixed [so it doesn't repeatedly download cache on launch] - Lobby - Tutorial Island - Custom combat system[/COLOR]
[img]http://frostblades.org/ad/divider.png[/img] [/CENTER] [img]http://frostblades.org/img/ad/server/0.png[/img] [img]http://frostblades.org/img/ad/server/1.jpg[/img] item.title: Frost Blades - Simply the best
item.dc:creator: @OwnerViper OwnerViper
item.description:
@OwnerViper wrote:

thakillah:

Good luck viper

Thanks man

Avarrocka:

Good luck with this project. However, I hate those time of images. The owner in full bandos killing an iron armored player.

It’s just an image :p, in reality the owners aren’t on the HoH, Hiscores etc. Staff members get no special advantages to get ahead in the game, just power and responsibility.

item.title: Frost Blades - Simply the best
item.dc:creator: @OwnerViper OwnerViper
item.description:
@OwnerViper wrote:

[CENTER]

[COLOR=teal]Looking to play a dedicated server that updates often with many many features running 24/7 stands out of the crowd with a billion features? look no further!
We bring you Frost blades, a dedicated server which runs 24/7 with no lag, we are a Matrix based server, we have many many features, a good economy, we update daily and never fail to impress.

If there’s something we don’t have and you’d like to see, just let us know.

Features:
Frost blades server:

  • We are currently 718 Loading 737!
    We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a ‘perfect’ pvp system, Loyalty programme, and much more![/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]PvP/Pking:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- We have a refined Pvp sysem

  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking
  • Good Switching
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]PvM:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects

  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows
  • All other God-wars bosses!
  • Duel arena
  • Castle Wars[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]PvP And PvM:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless

  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Grand Exchange[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- MySql Database

  • Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape
  • Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape
  • Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Highscores[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape

  • Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape
  • Can compare your skills with other players skills
  • Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating
    [/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Skills:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Attack

  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Magic
  • RuneCrafting
  • Construction - Player Owned Houses
  • Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop!
  • Constitution
  • Agility
  • Herblore
  • Thieving
  • Crafting
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Hunter
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • FireMaking
  • WoodCutting
  • Farming
  • Summoning[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Monsters:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- TzTok-Jad

  • Haar’Aken
  • WildyWyem
  • Ice Strykewyrm
  • Glacors
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Kree’Arra
  • Nex
  • General Graardor
  • Commander Zilyana
  • K’ril Tsutsaroth
  • Frost Dragons
  • King Black Dragon
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Deamons
  • Queen Black Dragon[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Minigames:[/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00]

  • Barrows
  • Castle Wars
  • Combat Titans (Custom minigame)
  • Dominion Tower
  • Duel Arena
  • Fight Kiln
  • Bounty Hunter (2009 Version)
  • Fight Pits
  • The Crusible
  • Warriors guild
  • Soul Wars
  • Tzhaar Fight Caves
  • Fight Pits
  • Pest Control
  • Fist of Guthix
  • Clan Wars[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Others:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Grave Stones

  • Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server.
  • More Auras
  • Decanting
  • Fixed Shops
  • Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses.
  • Bones-on-Altar
  • Effigies
  • Full Quick Chat
  • All Spells in the ancients Spell book
  • Trading
  • Dicing
  • Curses & Prayers
  • Perfect combat, 100% flawless
  • Armour set effects all added
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Full Completionists cape[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Quests:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Lost City

  • Doric’s Quest
  • Imp Catcher
  • Demon Slayer
  • Doric’s Quest
  • Ernest the chicken
  • Goblin Diplomacy
  • Imp Catcher
  • Rune Mysteries
  • Cooks Assistant
  • Nomad’s Requiem[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0000FF]Other:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00FF00]- Cache error fixed [so it doesn’t repeatedly download cache on launch]

  • Lobby
  • Tutorial Island
  • Custom combat system[/COLOR]


[/CENTER]

















































VrEE1vh.png809×365







[center][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=6][COLOR=#00FF00]Tutorial Island[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/center]
